description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Based on a blast from the past, this single player game has 99 levels, 2 modes - Retro and Powerplay and 3 difficulty settings for each. The Powerplay mode gives powerups - they don't last forever but you'll need them to survive. So stay still & get dead quick. Or fly over the powerups & deal out some fast damage, get a shield or trigger the mines. Aimeroids. Scratch them all.
